languages.text: "Впервые мне представилась возможность найти ответы на вопросы, которых избегали мои наставники. Почему Тисифона выбрала меня? Что есть Атлас? Правдивы ли слова о кровавом прошлом Дома Орселлио? Прошу вас, {name}, не оборвите натянувшуюся нить моей судьбы! Отправьтесь со мной к далеким звездам, по следам Тисифоны!"

traits.locale_text: "Впервые мне представилась возможность найти ответы на вопросы, которых избегали мои наставники. Почему Тисифона выбрала меня? Что есть Атлас? Правдивы ли слова о кровавом прошлом Дома Орселлио? Прошу вас, {name}, не оборвите натянувшуюся нить моей судьбы! Отправьтесь со мной к далеким звездам, по следам Тисифоны!"

languages.text: "For the first time ever, I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of destiny — my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the distant stars!"
languages.original_text: "Впервые мне представилась возможность найти ответы на вопросы, которых избегали мои наставники. Почему Тисифона выбрала меня? Что есть Атлас? Правдивы ли слова о кровавом прошлом Дома Орселлио? Прошу вас, {name}, не оборвите натянувшуюся нить моей судьбы! Отправьтесь со мной к далеким звездам, по следам Тисифоны!"

traits.locale_text: "For the first time, I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the faraway stars!"

"For the first time, I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the faraway stars!"

"For the first time ever do I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the faraway stars!"

"For the first time ever do I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the faraway stars!"

"For the first time ever, I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of destiny — my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the distant stars!"

"For the first time ever, I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of destiny — my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the distant stars!"

languages.text: 「あたくしのメンターにうまくかわされた問いの答えを見つける機会が、初めて訪れたのです。ティシフォンはなぜあたくしを選んだのか？アトラスとは何か？オーセリオ家の過去が血にまみれているというのは真実なのか？お願いです、{name}様、あたくしの張りつめた運命の糸を断ち切らないでください！あたくしと共に、ティシフォンの跡を追って彼方の星々へ向かってもらいたいのです！」
languages.original_text: "For the first time ever, I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of destiny — my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the distant stars!"

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしのメンターにうまくかわされた問いの答えを見つける機会が、初めて訪れたのです。ティシフォンはなぜあたくしを選んだのか？アトラスとは何か？オーセリオ家の過去が血にまみれているというのは真実なのか？お願いです、{name}様、あたくしの張りつめた運命の糸を断ち切らないでください！あたくしと共に、ティシフォンの跡を追って彼方の星々へ向かってもらいたいのです！」

languages.text: “我的导师始终在巧妙地回避着这些问题，这是我第一次有机会找到这些问题的答案。提西福涅为什么会选择我？群星圣仪到底是什么？奥赛罗家族的过去真的充满血腥吗？求求你了，{name}，不要掐断这根紧绷的命运之弦！那是我的命运！和我一起寻找提西福涅的足迹，前往遥远的星空之中吧！”
languages.original_text: "For the first time ever, I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of destiny — my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the distant stars!"

traits.locale_text: “我的导师始终在巧妙地回避着这些问题，这是我第一次有机会找到这些问题的答案。提西福涅为什么会选择我？群星圣仪到底是什么？奥塞罗家族的过去真的充满血腥吗？求求你了，{name}，不要掐断这根紧绷的命运之弦！和我一起寻找提西福涅的足迹，前往遥远的星空之中吧！”

languages.text: « Pour la toute première fois, j'ai l'occasion de trouver les réponses aux questions que mes mentors ont mis tant de soin à esquiver. Pourquoi Tisiphone m'a-t-elle choisie, moi ? Qu'est-ce que l'Atlas ? Est-il vrai que le passé de la maison Orsellio est entaché de sang ? Je vous en prie, {name}, ne coupez pas ce fil de la destinée... ma destinée ! Marchez avec moi sur les traces de Tisiphone ! »
languages.original_text: "For the first time ever, I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of destiny — my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the distant stars!"

traits.locale_text: « Pour la toute première fois, j'ai l'occasion de trouver les réponses aux questions que mes mentors ont mis tant de soin à esquiver. Pourquoi Tisiphone m'a-t-elle choisie, moi ? Qu'est-ce que l'Atlas ? Est-il vrai que le passé de la maison Orsellio est taché de sang ? Je vous en prie, {name}, ne coupez pas ce fil de ma destinée ! Marchez avec moi sur les traces de Tisiphone ! »

languages.text: «Por primera vez en mi vida tengo la oportunidad de encontrar la respuesta a las preguntas que mis mentores siempre eludían con tanta pericia. ¿Por qué me escogió Tisiphone? ¿Qué es el Atlas? ¿Es cierto que el pasado de la casa Orsellio está manchado de sangre? ¡Por favor, {name}, no corte esta hebra del destino, de mi destino, que ya se halla lo bastante tensa! ¡Viaje conmigo a las estrellas remotas, siguiendo los pasos de Tisiphone!».
languages.original_text: "For the first time ever, I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of destiny — my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the distant stars!"

traits.locale_text: «Por primera vez en mi vida tengo la oportunidad de encontrar la respuesta a las preguntas que mis mentores siempre eludían con tanta pericia. ¿Por qué me escogió Tisiphone? ¿Qué es el Atlas? ¿Es cierto que el pasado de la casa Orsellio está manchado de sangre? ¡Por favor, {name}, no corte esta hebra del destino que ya se halla lo bastante tensa! ¡Viaje conmigo a las estrellas remotas, siguiendo los pasos de Tisiphone!».

languages.text: "Zum ersten Mal überhaupt habe ich die Gelegenheit, Antworten auf die Fragen zu finden, die meine Mentoren so geschickt gemieden haben. Warum hat Tisiphone mich ausgewählt? Was ist der Atlas? Stimmt es, dass die Vergangenheit von Haus Orsellio mit Blut getränkt ist? Bitte, {name}, durchtrennt diese straff gespannte Saite des Schicksals nicht — meines Schicksals! Folgt mit mir Tisiphones Spuren zu den fernen Sternen!"
languages.original_text: "For the first time ever, I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of destiny — my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the distant stars!"

traits.locale_text: "Zum ersten Mal überhaupt habe ich die Gelegenheit, Antworten auf die Fragen zu finden, die meine Mentoren so geschickt gemieden haben. Warum hat Tisiphone mich ausgewählt? Was ist der Atlas? Stimmt es, dass die Vergangenheit von Haus Orsellio mit Blut getränkt ist? Bitte, {name}, durchtrennt diese straff gespannte Saite meines Schicksals nicht! Folgt mit mir Tisiphones Spuren zu den fernen Sternen!"

languages.text: "Yönderlerimin ustaca savuşturduğu soruların yanıtlarına kavuşmak için elime ilk kez fırsat geçti. Tisiphone neden beni seçti? Atlas aslında nedir? Orsellio Hanesi'nin geçmişinin kana bulanmış olduğu doğru mu? Lütfen {name}; kaderin, yani kaderimin bu ince teli kopmasın! Benimle Tisiphone'nin peşinden uzak yıldızlara gel!"
languages.original_text: "For the first time ever, I have an opportunity to find answers to the questions my mentors so deftly avoided. Why did Tisiphone choose me? What is the Atlas? Is it true that House Orsellio's past is drenched in blood? Please, {name}, do not snap this tautly drawn string of destiny — my destiny! Journey with me in Tisiphone's wake to the distant stars!"

traits.locale_text: "Yönderlerimin ustaca savuşturduğu soruların yanıtlarına kavuşmak için elime ilk kez bir fırsat geçti. Tisiphone neden beni seçmiş? Atlas aslında nedir? Orsellio Hanesi'nin geçmişinin kana bulanmış olduğu doğru mu? Lütfen {name}; kaderin, yani kaderimin bu ince teli kopmasın! Benimle Tisiphone'nin peşinden uzak yıldızlara gel!"
